appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this new version the game experience is better than ever!
- Beautiful New game graphics.
- Support One Click Move.
- Select your favorite direction: play as either White or Black.
- New beautiful animated emojis!!
- Double without turning off the "Auto Roll": click the double button on your
opponents turn to offer the double. The double will then be offered at the beginning
of your turn.
- Now you can see all players that are watching your game.
